```{r, hex, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.align = 'center', out.width = '25%', out.height = '25%'}

##Sys block
options(warn = -1)

##Library block
library(showtext)
library(hexSticker)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)

##Code block
data <- data.frame(X = runif(n = 500),
                   Y = seq(from = 1, to = 1000, length.out = 500))

plot <- ggplot(data, 
               aes(x = X, y = Y)) + 
        geom_line(color = '#f39c12',
                  alpha = 0.8,
                  size = 0.25) + 
        theme_void() + 
        theme_transparent()

font_add_google('Righteous', 'text')
showtext_auto()

sticker(plot, 
        package = 'chaosInPylo',
        p_size = 125,
        p_family = 'text',
        p_color = '#f39c12',
        p_x = 1,
        p_y = .55,
        h_fill = 'yellow',
        h_color = 'darkred',
        h_size = 1,
        s_x = 1,
        s_y = 1.2,
        s_width = 1.5,
        s_height = .75,
        filename = './fts/hex.png',
        dpi = 2000)

include_graphics('./fts/hex.png')

```
